description:
Recorded at a full day of Tabernacle Prayer teaching and activation, these powerful video sessions lead the listener through the gates of the Heavenly Tabernacle on a revelation filled journey into the Holy of Holies. If you want to learn to pray Tabernacle | Temple Prayer you will be inspired and instructed with 4 hours of in depth revelatory teaching, activation and testimony. The teaching begins with a look at foundational truths concerning prayer, and the reality of the Heavenly tabernacle, and then steps through the gates to begin a step-by-step guide through the Tabernacle and right into the Holy of Holies.

Register now to get lifetime online access to all 21 videos, leading you step-by-step from the doorway to the Holy of Holies.

The teaching begins with a look at foundational truths concerning prayer, and the reality of the Heavenly tabernacle, and then steps through the gates to begin a step-by-step guide through the Tabernacle and right into the Holy of Holies.

SECTION 1. Introduction & The Doorway

Learn how praise, worship and thanksgiving carries us into the heavenlies to approach God.

SECTION 2. The Brazen Altar – The Cross

How to apply the awesome results and benefits of the cross in our lives through prayer.

SECTION 3. The Brazen Laver

How to set ourselves apart in service to God through His Word, and understanding how the atonement transforms law into promise.

SECTION 4: THE HOLY PLACE

The Golden Candlestick & the Table of Showbread

The Golden CandlestickCommuning with the Holy Spirit, and receiving from Him as you fellowship in the heavenly sanctuary.

Hearing the NOW Word of God from Jesus’ lips.

SECTION 5: THE HOLY OF HOLIES

The Altar of Incense & The Ar of the Covenant

Offering true New Covenant sacrifices of praise and worship, and coming before the Father with full confidence to present your requests before Him.
title: How To Pray Tabernacle Prayer
